climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: PREMIUM QUALITY AND HYPOALLERGENIC: Award-winning, doctor endorsed and patent pending diapers that are completely natural, hypoallergenic, vegan and gluten free. Our diapers do not contain harsh chemicals, chlorine, additives, phthalates, and fragrances, making them safe for babies sensitive skin and a great alternative to cloth diapers.

PURE COMFORT: Wrap your baby in total comfort, with top and bottom sheets made from organic silky soft 100% bamboo fibers. Stretchy elastic cuffs provide a secure and snug fit. Aloe liner keeps' baby's skin hydrated. Wetness Indicator helps you know when your baby is ready for a change.

SAY GOODBYE TO DIAPER RASH: A highly absorbent core made with TCF wood pulp and Super Absorbent Polymer (SAP) ensures solid water locking for quick absorption that pulls wetness away from baby's skin The breathable temperature regulating bamboo sheets keep babies skin cool and dry protecting the skin from irritation and diaper rash. Diapers can be used for both day and night.

MADE RESPOSIBLIY WITH CARE: Bamboo suppliers certified forest friendly, and OK biodegradable in soil. They maintain high safety and product standards with certifications from the FDA and OKEO-TEX, for products that meet ecological safety and sustainability.

BONUS FEATURES: We are the only bamboo diaper that comes in prints. Check out our gender-neutral bamboo print made with eco-friendly water-based ink. We also color code our sizes so you never have to look for those tiny size labels again. For babies weighing between 13-24lbs. (6-11kgs.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Disposable Diaper
reviews.reviewText: I have used cloth diapers for both of my children. Then there are times when I choose to use a disposable diaper. When it comes to what I put on them, I'm very selective. Little Toes was recommended by a friend and Im really happy that I tried them. The print is gender neutral, the material is very soft and the absorbency is great. The tabs stay put with no issue on my wiggly little baby. I love that this brand has put so much effort into creating a functional diaper that is good for our babies sensitive skin! The bamboo fibers have so many benefits and are much better for our environment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I bought these diapers as our son is highly sensitive to the chemicals in other diapers, and we wanted a natural, hypoallergenic alternative to all the other diapers on the market.Well, we were certainly thrilled once we tried Little Toes diapers.The absorbency was excellent, as our son slept through the night, and by am,his bodily fluids were all contained in this diaper.The Little Toes diapers also fit true to size, and the tape closure stuck well, These bamboo fiber natural diapers,are a must for anyone looking for an ultra soft diaper that fits well, with excellent absorbency.My wife and I would highly recommend these diapers.They are a bit pricey, but worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Blow out with every diaper
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like these. There was a blow out with every single poppy diaper. After a lot of research I highly recommend Ecoriginal diapers for a cotton diaper that is free of toxins. They even have them for sale on Amazon for less money then they sale them in the Ecoriginals website. Ecoriginals are lovely diapers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great diapers, eco-friendly, no leakage!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these diapers for my 6.5 month old daughter. Not only are they eco-friendly, but they are very soft and absorb really well. They did not cause rashes or irritate her skin and have proved to be very comfortable for my baby. She is able to wear them all night without any leakage. I would definitely recommend these diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I love the diapers so far, they seem to be the best natural diaper of all the ones we have tried. However I am only giving 3 stars because I would think if we are buying natural diapers we are people that care about the earth and our child's health but for some reason in the picture it looks like they come in a carring box but nope it is plastic. Why go to all the trouble if you are just going to wrap them in plastic, please rethink your packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Update:Once we finally got to ise them around the 10lb mark they were wonderful. Super absorbent, and did not give my son a red butt at all. He has been soooo sensitive to almost every brand of diaper we've tried. And yes we change him very often.I will have to update these once we actually get to use them. They are huge! No way are these going to fit my 6.5lb newborn. They say they will fit a newborn, but they are huge! I attached a photo of them next to a hello bello newborn sized diaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I was becoming frustrated when my granddaughter was getting red, irritated skin from her diapers. Her parents and I tried many different brands, but even diapers that said they were hypoallergenic still caused redness. I went on Amazon and saw Little Toes and decided to give them a try. My granddaughter did not get red from these diapers and we are thrilled. Not only that, I am one of those people who drives a Prius, doesn’t drink bottled water and who wants to in some small way contribute to caring about the Earth. When I saw that Little Toes were biodegradable, I was extra excited about them. I also like that these diapers feel softer than some of the other brands and so I am sure they are more comfortable for my granddaughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2018
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are amazing, soft with my baby’s skin, super absorbent, come in three sizes, for my 7month baby I use the medium size, it’s a little big but works fine, without any problem, It’s incredible there is a diaper that desintegrates in less than 200 days, made it with bamboo fiber, the only detail that I don’t love is only one design per size, Iam happy with the product for my baby and for the planet too.
